strategy: Chaos Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 4. Thousand Sons are also subject to 'The Architect of Fate' special rule.
Initiative: The Thousand Sons Retinue, Havocs, Terminators, Armoured Company, Disc Riders, and Warphound formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Thousand Sons with Chaos Mutant allies.

sections.name: Thousand Sons Core Formations
sections.description: Up to one Thousand Sons Terminators formation for each Thousand Sons Retinue.

formations.name: Thousand Sons Retinue
formations.units: One Aspiring Sorcerer, five Rubric Marines, four Chaos Space Marines
extraUnits: Replace four Chaos Space Marines with four Thousand Sons Havocs: 50 points

formations.name: Thousand Sons Terminators
formations.units: One Aspiring Sorcerer, four Scarab Occult Terminators

sections.name: Thousand Sons Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three may be taken per Thousand Sons Core formation.

formations.name: Tzaangor Host
formations.units: One Chaos Spawn, eight Tzaangors, Daemonic Pact
extraUnits: Replace the Chaos Spawn with a Mutalith Warp Beast: 75 points

formations.name: Armoured Company
extraUnits: Replace four Thousand Sons Predators with four Thousand Sons Land Raiders: 75 points

formations.name: Havocs
formations.units: Four Thousand Sons Havocs, two Chaos Rhinos, Daemonic Pact

formations.name: Disc Riders
formations.units: One Aspiring Champion, six Sorcerer Disc Riders, Daemonic Pact

sections.name: Dark Mechanicus and Thousand Sons Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations.

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points.

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Greater Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Greater Daemon Pool points. The first one is free.

upgrades.title: Thousand Sons Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace the Aspiring Sorcerer with an Exalted Sorcerer
Replace the Aspiring Sorcerer and its unit with a Daemon Prince of Tzeentch
(No more than the minimum needed to transport the formation)

items.name: Champion of Chaos
items.description: Add one Champion of Chaos to the formation

items.name: Icon Bearer
items.description: Add one Icon Bearer to the formation

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Thousand Sons Dreadnoughts to the formation

items.name: Predators
items.description: Add up to two Thousand Sons Predators to the formation
